pr_title: Fix SAML metadata URLs in tenant qualified URL mode

timeline.message: Fix SAML metadata URLs in tenant qualified URL mode

timeline.bodyText: Can't we use the ServiceURLBuilder here to get the URL?
timeline.author: ashensw

replies.bodyText:
Some of the SAML URLs don't need the tenant domain appended as a query param. For example the artifact resolve URL.
If we use the ServiceURLBuilder all of them will be appended with the tenant domain.
But i think we can improve and use two methods for the two cases.
replies.author: mefarazath
